```{r}
#knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir=dirname(getwd()))
library(magrittr)
source('../lib/R/geo.R')

config$geo_datasets %>% paste(seq_along(.), ., sep=': ') %>% cat(sep=', ')
```
